com.vaadin.polymer.neon.element

Interface NeonAnimatableElement

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Element, EventTarget, HTMLElement, Node

    @JsType
public interface NeonAnimatableElement
extends HTMLElement

    <neon-animatable> is a simple container element implementing Polymer.NeonAnimatableBehavior. This is a convenience element for use with <neon-animated-pages>.

    <neon-animated-pages selected="0"
                      entry-animation="slide-from-right-animation"
                      exit-animation="slide-left-animation">
   <neon-animatable>1</neon-animatable>
   <neon-animatable>2</neon-animatable>
 </neon-animated-pages>

        JavaScript Info:

      • getEntryAnimation

        @JsProperty
String getEntryAnimation()

        Convenience property for setting an ‘entry’ animation. Do not set animationConfig.entry
        manually if using this. The animated node is set to this if using this property.

        JavaScript Info:

      • setEntryAnimation

        @JsProperty
void setEntryAnimation(String value)

        Convenience property for setting an ‘entry’ animation. Do not set animationConfig.entry
        manually if using this. The animated node is set to this if using this property.

        JavaScript Info:

        manually if using this. The animated node is set to this if using this property.

        JavaScript Info:

      • setExitAnimation

        @JsProperty
void setExitAnimation(String value)

        Convenience property for setting an ‘exit’ animation. Do not set animationConfig.exit
        manually if using this. The animated node is set to this if using this property.

        JavaScript Info:

      • getAnimationConfig

        void getAnimationConfig(com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject type)

        An element implementing Polymer.NeonAnimationRunnerBehavior calls this method to configure
        an animation with an optional type. Elements implementing Polymer.NeonAnimatableBehavior
        should define the property animationConfig, which is either a configuration object
        or a map of animation type to array of configuration objects.

        JavaScript Info:
        Parameters:
        {} - type
